short_summary: Bathroom renovation and sprinkler tree replacement at Mountain Institution
description: Renovate bathroom and replace sprinkler tree in Building W13 at Mountain Institution. Work to be completed in 36 weeks.
full_summary:
# Invitation to Qualify for a Civil Service Contract

**Procurement ID:** WS3929272821
**Procurement Title (English):** Phase 2 EZ899-231750 Mountain Institution Building W13, Bathroom Renovation and Sprinkler Tree Replacement
**Procurement Title (French):** Phase 2 EZ899-231750 Le remplacement des gicleurs et la rénovation de la salle de bain de l’établissement Mountain

**Contractor Information:**
- **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
- **Phone:** Not available
- **Email:** simon.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **End User Entities:** Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)

**Notice Details:**
- **Notice Type:** Invitation to Qualify
- **Method of Procurement:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
- **Procurement Category:** CNST

**Description of Works:**
Correctional Services of Canada (CSC) is seeking a contractor to renovate the bathroom and replace the sprinkler tree in Building W13 at the Mountain Institution in Agassiz, BC. The project is expected to be completed within 36 weeks after contract award.

**Technical Specifications:**
The unspsc code for this project is:

* 70171700 (Irrigation system maintenance and management services)
* 72101510 (Plumbing system maintenance or repair)
* 72121103 (Commercial and office building renovation and repair service)
* 72151100 (Plumbing construction services)

**Tender Information:**
- **Tender Closing Date:** May 29, 2023, 2:00 PM (EDT)
- **Tender Status:** Expiring
- **Original Notice Date:** May 5, 2023

**Trade Agreements:**
This project is open to contractors under the following trade agreements:
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Delivery:**
The project will be delivered in the following regions:
- British Columbia
- Canada

Note: The information in the table of contents has been condensed for better readability.
